tweet: If I'm the pillar you need to lean on, who's going to catch us both when I fall down?
By understanding time, we can eventually defeat it.
should I tell him he's not in me yet?  - Robocop
If life is a book, then I'm the author.  I'm just having writer's block at the moment.
I don't know what's worse about being mortal...Dying when you're not ready or decaying to the point where you want to.
